parameters.name: App
parameters.description:
The name of the application that plays the output streams of the monitoring session.

You can specify a name. If you do not specify a name, the system uses **monitor** as the name of the application.

parameters.name: CallbackUrl
parameters.description: Supports input of callback addresses in HTTP(S) format.

parameters.name: DingTalkWebHookUrl
parameters.description:
DingTalk alert monitoring sends alert notifications through a DingTalk group robot. Please set up the DingTalk group robot first and enter the HTTP(S) address of the robot here. For more details, see [Custom Robot Access](https://open.dingtalk.com/document/robots/custom-robot-access).
> Configure the custom keyword for the DingTalk group robot as 'alert', otherwise, messages will not be received.

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The endpoint of the monitoring session.

parameters.name: InputList
parameters.description: The list of input streams to monitor. For more information, see the following **InputConfig** table.

parameters.name: MonitorConfig
parameters.description: Alarm threshold setting for monitoring, in JSON format. For more details, please refer to the table below for MonitorConfig.

parameters.name: MonitorName
parameters.description: The name of the monitoring session.

parameters.name: OutputTemplate
parameters.description:
The output template of the monitoring session. Valid values:

*   **lp_ld**: low definition.
*   **lp_sd**: standard definition.
*   **lp_hd**: high definition.
*   **lp_ud**: ultra high definition.

parameters.name: Stream
parameters.description: The name of the output stream of the monitoring session. If you do not specify a name, the system generates a name at random.
